page.title: 08Clubs in Dyserth and Meliden
page.content: The adults of Dyserth can participate in many clubs,amongst them are The British Red Cross Society,The Field Club,The W.R.V.S.,The N.S.P.C.C.,The League of Hospital Friends The Elderly Club,The Hiraddug W.I. and its welsh equivalent-Merched y Wawr.It also has it's own Community Council. Dyserth's Soccer team play in Rhyl whilst the Badminton Club meets in the school.The Bowling Club even has its own floodlights. Ysgol Hiraddug has a Book Club,the Urdd,Gymnastics as well as a soccer, netball and rounders teams.Parents are involved in the Pottery and Craft classes and the P.T.A. Ysgol Melyd has a Wildlife and Ornithology Club,Bookshop,Gymnastics plus soccer,netball and rounders teams.Meliden soccer team play on a nearby public pitch.
